title: Bug 6304 cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When trying to sync a .java file and another resource, an error occurs and the synchronization fails.
EB: The .java file and the other resource should sync successfully without any error.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the file synchronization tool.
2. Select a .java file and another resource to sync.
3. Click on the sync button.
4. Observe the error message and the failed synchronization.
